name: Twitter Island
description:
find yourself or make new friends as you
explore an island filled with 10,000 birds

a short project to celebrate reaching 10,000 Twitter followers
and to say thank you very much to all of them

play on keyboard (arrow keys and spacebar) or gamepad
press m to toggle mute, n to toggle fullscreen and esc to quit

restricted account usernames have not been included

no accounts details (other than username) are used in any way

this is a work of fiction, usernames are used in a fictitious manner,
bird opinions do not reflect the opinions of real people and any
resemblance to actual persons or birds is purely coincidental

you can message me on Twitter and I will happily remove
your username in the next update

a game by Daniel Linssen
with sound by Martin Kvale
and thanks to B. Holcombe
as well as Jonathon Tree
